text: —jewellery store?” Loki kisses him softly. “We’ll get something so I can do a real proposal.” Loki hums.
Loki nuzzles up to him and lines up his hands with Jerome’s. “When you’re better, before we head off, why don’t we pay a visit to a —
Loki kisses him happily and nuzzles close. “Good. Cuz all I need is you.”
Loki grins and rubs his sides. “You hungry? Tired? Need anything?” He nudges his nose against Jerome’s with a smile.
“Always, completely and fully.” Loki grins and kisses him deeply, “forever.” Loki scoots closer, holding his face.
Loki nuzzles close, straddling his lap and kissing him. “I love you, always,” He whispers.
Loki walks over and kisses him happily. “Lets hey you dressed, babe.” Loki helps him pull the shirt on and kisses him again.
—while grabbing Jerome some new clothes.
Loki purrs and nuzzles close. “Let’s get you warmed up.” Loki kisses him and carries J back to bed. He sets him down and starts the fire—
—standing up. Loki wraps the towel around Jerome.
“I love you.” He whispers and holds him close. “Let’s get you back to bed.” Loki sets the tub to drain and makes a towel appear, carefully—
Loki kisses him softly. “I missed you too, so much.” Loki rinses his torso off and smiles at him.
“You just like to listen to my voice.” Loki smiles and kisses him, “once you’re all healthy I’ll start making arrangements.” He hums.
— much during our stay.” Loki laughs softly and smirks.
“Hm, not too good. You deserve everything I do for you.” Loki kisses him happily. “I’d be fine. Besides I doubt we’d leave our chambers—
—softly against his lips.
“Even if they did, they wouldn’t dare say so.” Loki kisses him softly. “They’re pretty much all terrified of me up there.” He chuckles —
—watches Jerome’s face.
“They’ll treat you like a god.” Loki hums and starts to soap up Jerome’s body. “Or they’ll leave us alone completely.” He smiles and —
“We’d have interruptions, now worries about the GCPD,” Loki whispers and kisses his forehead with a smile
